review: The Chromecast is an inexpensive solution for turning your "dumb" TV into a "smart" one. If you own an older model HDTV or HDTV that doesn't feature the smart capabilities of newer model TVs like I do, you're probably missing out on built in apps like Netflix, Hulu Plus, etc. The Chromecast is a great way to extend your TV's capabilities and value. The Chromecast simply connects through HDMI and will allow you to pair your smart phones, tablets and computers through your wifi network. I've used the Chromecast for streaming or "casting" videos through google chrome from my computer to the TV and this feature works great! The picture is crystal clear, HD quality! I also take advantage of its mirroring capabilities, which allows me to view what I'm doing on my desktop on the TV screen. I highly recommend this product for anyone who's considering upgrading to a smart TV, save yourself some money and give this a shot before you do!
author: Michieface
